title: AI & Reinforcement Learning From Scratch
shortDescription: Built machine learning and reinforcement learning engines from scratch — no libraries — for maximum performance.
description: Implemented machine learning and reinforcement learning algorithms entirely from scratch in Python, without using high-level ML libraries. The goal was achieving higher performance and deeper understanding by controlling every layer of computation.
reason: Ever wanted to build an AI inside Minecraft? Well I did, but the existing libraries took seconds to pass an epoch even on a high-end PC. So I knew what I had to do, I wrote my own library which can train at hundreds of epochs/second. Not for general purposes, purely for this project.
